headline: Assessing Essex Property Trust (ESS) Valuation After Analyst Downgrades And California Policy Concerns
summary: Recent analyst downgrades and cautious ratings on Essex Property Trust (ESS) have put a spotlight on the REIT. Investors are weighing California policy risks, moderated funds from operations growth, and ongoing regulatory uncertainty. See our latest analysis for Essex Property Trust. The recent analyst downgrades and California policy concerns line up with a soft patch in momentum, with the share price at US$251.02 and a year to date share price return of a 2.28% decline.
